Summary: Orange lights in sky seen by witnesses
divs: Sighting DetailsWitness was at home when he saw an orange light in the southseastern sky. Atfirst he thought it could be a rocket, but then the light was stationary. Hevideotaped the object as it appeared to be stationary. He videotaped it becausehe didnt know what it was. The object appeared to be a circular orangelights.It remained stationary until the light just seemed to go out. Thishappened several times and at one point there were several lights in the sky. Two days later the wife and son went down the street to shop. Not even aquarter of a mile away. They saw the same lights and drove in pursuit towardsthe direction of the lights to get a better look at it. Infomation on thissighting case #1-273.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Winter Haven
There were no other sightings in Winter Haven on or around February 7th 2000
